Ingredients.5: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place tomatoes, olive oil, oregano, garlic, salt, and pepper in a large bowl; stir until evenly combined.

Directions.2: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add gnocchi and boil until they float, about 3 minutes. Drain in a colander and shake to remove excess water.

Directions.3: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.

Directions.4: Melt butter in a large microwave-safe bowl. Stir in Parmesan cheese. Add drained gnocchi and toss until evenly coated. Transfer gnocchi to the air fryer basket. Air fry for a total of 12 minutes, shaking the basket every 3 minutes.

Directions.5: Divide reserved tomato mixture between serving bowls and top with fried gnocchi. Garnish with chopped parsley.
